Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Central
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Columbus and 79th: due to, street blockage near 79th/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Columbus and 79th: due to, street blockage near 79th/Central.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Thorndale
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Thorndale due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Thorndale due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute near Chicago/Wabash
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses rrtd WB via Chicago, Michigan, Ontario, State and Chicago;Chicago, Sate, Ohio, Michigan and Chicago due to police activity near Chicago/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Chicago/Wabash.

  • Westbound buses will operate via Chicago, Michigan, Ontario, State and Chicago, then resume their normal route.
  • Eastbound buses will operate via Chicago, Sate, Ohio, Michigan and Chicago, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
